ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added an option to un-group zones' themes. This allows you to assign different colors for EU/NA zone types.
Reworked color-blind settings, converting it to an automatic color conversion which allows Zone Color Changer to also convert any custom zones, or future vanilla zones based on their base color.
Temporary folder is now cleared on startup too, instead of just on exit.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Fixed hanging when opening zoning toolbar.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Zones' thumbnails now match their respective custom color.
Fixed custom mixed-zone office zone types not showing in the panel.
